title: HyperChat
showcase.title: Elevate your YouTube livestream experience.
showcase.text: Performance optimizations. Customization options. Cutting-edge features!
customisables.subtitle: Adapt HyperChat for you.
customisables.theme.title: Pick your theme
customisables.theme.description: Choose from light, dark or the stock YouTube theme.
customisables.rendering.title: Chat message rendering
customisables.rendering.description: Pick whether to show profile icons, badges, mentions etc.
customisables.emojis.title: Emojis
customisables.emojis.description: Pick how to show emojis, and whether to hide them.
customisables.filters.title: Filters
about.text: HyperChat is a browser extension that enhances the YouTube live chat experience. It reduces the CPU and memory usage of the default YouTube live chat significantly, and provides more customization options.
install.text: You can install HyperChat from the install page.
